vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for water and wastewater main replacements at 20 locations - Muniz Construction, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of six - Not to exceed $17,315,565.00 - Financing: Water Construction Fund ($7,083,895.23), 2022C Water Revenue Bonds TWDB LM221535 Fund ($2,607,299.77), Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund ($5,624,370.00), and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($2,000,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize a construction services contract for water and wastewater main replacements at 20 locations - Muniz Construction, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of six - Not to exceed $17,315,565.00 - Financing: Water Construction Fund ($7,083,895.23), 2022C Water Revenue Bonds TWDB LM221535 Fund ($2,607,299.77), Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund ($5,624,370.00), and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($2,000,000.00)
